data.prayer: Father, help the 477 believers in Az Zawiyah to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 300,423 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Az Zawiyah, Libya
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Az Zawiyah that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Az Zawiyah, Libya.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Az Zawiyah.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Az Zawiyah who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, please remember the Romani, Domari people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Az Zawiyah a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Az Zawiyah, Libya to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Az Zawiyah access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Az Zawiyah
